sentences.en: A little practicality, cherie, Remember, never in our home!
sentences.cn: 你得记着, 小姐, 记住, 绝不要在家里杀人!

sentences.en: Close - loop guidance is a kind of method with practicality and less error.
sentences.cn: 闭路 制导方法是一种实用的方法误差比较小的制导方法.

sentences.en: doubts about the practicality of your suggestion
sentences.cn: 对于你所提建议的可行性的怀疑

sentences.en: He questioned the practicality of the proposal.
sentences.cn: 他对该项建议的可行性表示怀疑.

sentences.en: I have doubts about the practicality of their proposal.
sentences.cn: 我怀疑他们的建议是否行得通。

sentences.en: Practicality also dictates what sort of art is produced today.
sentences.cn: 实用性还对现今的艺术制造发挥决定性作用.

sentences.en: Spirit of Yidelong: Solidarity, struggling, practicality, innovation and ceaseless self - improvement .
sentences.cn: 益德隆的精神: 团结, 拼博, 求实, 创新, 自强不息.

sentences.en: The experiments also demonstrate the effectiveness and practicality of this new filter.
sentences.cn: 仿真实验表明了该方法的有效性.

sentences.en: The feasibility and practicality of the method is verified through application cases.
sentences.cn: 通过应用案例验证该方法的可行性和实用性.

sentences.en: The furniture managed to combine practicality with elegance.
sentences.cn: 那些家具将实用和典雅完美结合。

sentences.en: The room's style exemplifies Conran's ideal of 'beauty and practicality'.
sentences.cn: 那个房间的风格是体现康兰“美观和实用”观念的典范。

sentences.en: The room's style exemplifies Conran's ideal of "beauty and practicality".
sentences.cn: 那个房间的风格是体现康兰“美观和实用”观念的典范。

sentences.en: The scientificity and practicality of text being the translating unit is restated.
sentences.cn: 再次强调翻译实践以语篇为单位的科学性和实用性.

sentences.en: Tongji University ( founded in 1907 ): Discipline , Practicality , Unity and Creativity.
sentences.cn: 暨南大学 ( 创建于1906年 ): 忠信笃敬.

sentences.en: Unity, practicality, development and innovation are the spirits of our factory.
sentences.cn: 团结 、 务实 、 开拓、创新是企业精神.

sentences.en: We have to take into consideration the parameter of practicality and artistry.
sentences.cn: 我们应该将艺术性和实用性等因素都考虑在内.

sentences.en: You need to think about comfort and practicality when choosing walking shoes.
sentences.cn: 选购步行鞋时需要考虑舒适性和实用性。

words.tran_cn: 可用的；行得通的；可实行的
实用性，实际性；实际，实例

trans.tran_en: how suitable something is, or whether it will work
